name: I Am Alone
description:
She just got home.

I Am Alone is an experimental inquisition experience which requires deliberation and ingenuity to complete. The dark halls and barren rooms of the house offer her no guidance, she must learn the truth through her own mettle. But if you cannot find it, you may feel free to abandon her outside. She will not be going anywhere.

Use the arrow keys to guide her.

Use the E key to interact with light switches and other things.

If you enjoy this experience be sure to rate it, recommend it to your acquaintances or; leave a comment on what you appreciated along with any suggestions you may have for improvements.  Without this support it is very difficult for games to gain any kind of public attention.
